title: How would you say “She said goodbye too many times before.” in Latin?

digraph Translation{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];Question[label="How to translate:
'She said goodbye too many times before.'
in Latin?", shape=ellipse];Attempt[label="Initial Attempt:
'Ea dixit 'Vale!' plurimis temporibus abhinc.'"];Feedback[label="Feedback:
- Overly literal
- Consider idiomatic phrases"];Suggestions[label="Suggested Translations:
- 'nimium valedīxit'
- 'totiēns valedīxit'
- 'illa nimium valedīxit'"]; Context[label="Context:
- From Maroon 5's song
- Discussion about subject omission in Latin"]; Question->Attempt;Attempt->Feedback;Feedback->Suggestions;Suggestions->Context;}

title: I can tolerate anything except the outgroup (2014)
dot: digraph ssc_outgroup{rankdir=LR;nodesep=0.5;ranksep=1.0;subgraph cluster_main_idea{label="I Can Tolerate Anything Except The Outgroup";style=filled;color=lightgrey;ssc[label="Slate Star Codex Blog", shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue, URL="https://slatestarcodex.com/"];tolerance[label="Tolerance (Perceived)", shape=diamond];outgroup[label="Outgroup", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=salmon];ingroup[label="Ingroup", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgreen];ssc->tolerance;tolerance->outgroup[label="Disdain/Criticism", color=red];tolerance->ingroup[label="Acceptance/Defense", color=green];subgraph cluster_tribes{label="Examples";style=filled;color=white;redtribe[label="Red Tribe (Conservative)", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=pink];bluetribe[label="Blue Tribe (Liberal)", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=skyblue];greytribe[label="Grey Tribe (Rationalist/Libertarian)", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor=grey];bluetribe->redtribe[label="Disdain/Criticism", color=red];{rank=same;bluetribe;greytribe}bluetribe->greytribe[label="Disdain/Criticism (Sometimes)", color=red, style=dashed];greytribe->bluetribe[label="Disdain/Criticism (Sometimes)", color=red, style=dashed];}}subgraph cluster_supporting_details{label="Supporting Details";style=filled;color=white;chesterton[label="Chesterton's Father Brown Story", shape=note, URL="https://slatestarcodex.com/2014/09/30/i-can-tolerate-anything-except-the-outgroup/"];implicit_assoc[label="Implicit Association Test", shape=note, URL="http://pcl.stanford.edu/research/2014/iyengar-ajps-group-polarization.pdf"];political_segregation[label="Political Segregation", shape=note];osama_thatcher[label="Osama/Thatcher Reactions", shape=note];chesterton->tolerance;implicit_assoc->outgroup;political_segregation->outgroup;osama_thatcher->outgroup;}}
